About the Company: Steel Authority of India (SAIL) is India`s largest state-owned iron ore producer. It is one the leading steel-making company in India.SAIL manufactures and sells a wide variety of steel products such as HR/CR sheets and coils, galvanised sheets, electrical sheets, structurals, railway products, plates, bars and rods, stainless steel and other alloy steels..The company also in the business activities of BSL, ASP, BSP, DSP, ISP, RSP, SSP, VISL.
